reviewText: this obvious ripoff of talkin tina totaly rocks!theres this dude who passes his soul into a doll upon his death using voodoo.the doll comes to life with the soul of a serial killer keeping it functional.the doll is sold to a littlke boy.chucky finds out he must put his soul into the boy in order to be human again.he gets killed and in part 2 returns coming after him and his half sister at thier foster home.they kill him again and in part 3,andy is big and in military school.chucky goes there after him.the kids wont learn anything useful from this and are likely to be scared.i like part 3 the best followed by part 1 and lastly part 2.each is about as good as the next and the bride of chucky is easier than them all.its pretty well likeable by all.id say chucky is a top 10 horror film star,right up there with mike myers,freddy,jason and leatherface.the only particuraly creepy part is in that the doll goes after a kid.theres no hot chicks.in part 2 his sister is alright.this is a cant miss for horror film lovers.
Title: N/A

reviewText: This is a great set it includes Child's Play 2, Child's play 3, and Bride of chucky. It is a great set the picture quality of them are decent. Except for part 3 it looked a little to grainy at times but not so bad. There isent alot of special features on the disc. I recommend any chucky fan ( like myself) to by this set you wont regret it.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Child's Play 2: 9/10: A worthy sequel to the first!Child's Play 3: 9.1/10: Underrated! Very fun, and the military setting is neat!Bride of Chucky: 9.5/10: A perfect blend of comedy and chills!Unfortunely, like others have stated, the first isn't included because it was made by another company. That's why I took off one star. Couldn't they have asked permission from the company that made the first one?! You also get free tickets to Seed of Chucky when you buy this. That movie kicks @$$!I suggest you order the first movie, then get this collection. The Chucky series is a horror/comedy masterpiece! Enough said.

reviewText: Keep in mind that you can buy the original for like 10 bucks at walmart so you really can't complain about it not being included.i do think the original was the best while many complained of it being boring but it was the origin of how it all begin so it just wasn't as fast paced. the first sequel was good but by the second one the series started to get dry but bride of chucky redeemed the series. all in all, if you enjoyed the first one you should enjoy the entire series as a whole.

reviewerName: Lunar Strain "Thrash, don't mind if I do"
reviewText: I am writing a response to a reviewer who stated "wtf is this?" and complained that this collection didn't include the first film. Well my friend, you apparently do not know your films very well. The first Child's Play was released by MGM. All the sequels (Child's Play 2, Child's Play 3, and Bride of Chucky) were released by Universal Pictures. Since MGM and UNIVERSAL are rival motion picture companies, there is no way in hell the first film would be included int his box set. So quite complaining! This box set is awsome and you really save some dough by buying it. You just have to buy the first movie seperatly.

reviewText: I can't believe this movie has 4 stars let alone people actually seriously giving it 5 stars.  This set of movies is probably the most terrible series you can buy.  It starts at number 2 and closes the series but they left out the only one worthy of about 3 stars.  Ever since the first it went downhill from a mediocre horror movie right into the slums of just ghastly horrible movies.  Disapointing, don't buy these movies if your life depends on it, they're terrible and so are the actors in them.  Just look at the first one, the mom is the mom of the kids in that show 7th Heaven, give me a break.

reviewText: I love Chuckie! He's such a great character that I never get tired of watching! This is a great collection with 3 great movies. In order from the best to worst: Child's Play 2, Bride of Chuckie, Child's Play 3. If a movie had a horrible plot, if you put Chuckie in it, I would be willing to watch it... Chuckie just adds this sort of funny yet scary and evil combination that adds humor and greatness to any movie. Whatever you do, just don't .... with the Chuck!
